pages.about: Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World: A Beacon of Luxury and Innovation on the Strip CASINO SPA & SALON ABOUT US Founded by Tan Sri Lim Goh Tong in 1965 Genting Berhad embarked on its journey with the ambitious project of a mountaintop resort in Malaysia, marking the inception of what would become a global conglomerate in the gaming, entertainment, and hospitality sectors. Registered with the Nevada Gaming Commission, Genting Berhad, a publicly-listed entity, has successfully extended its footprint, establishing Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World as part of its portfolio of integrated resorts that spans across the Americas, Malaysia, Singapore, the United Kingdom, and the Bahamas. Leading Developer of Destination Resorts Over the years, Genting has solidified its status as a leading developer and operator of destination resorts worldwide, drawing in over 50 million visitors annually to its properties. This achievement underscores its prominent position in the international arena of gaming, entertainment, and hospitality. The conglomerate has diversified its offerings through strategic affiliations with esteemed brands including Crockfords, Maxims, Crystal Cruises, Dream Cruises, and Star Cruises, in addition to collaborations with renowned entities like Universal Studios¬Æ, Premium Outlets¬Æ, Hard Rock Hotel, and Zouk. Contact Information Call for Reservations: 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM Daily General Room Reservations: 702-676-7000 Crockfords Luxury Reservations: 702-676-7033 Email: lasvegashiltonatresortsworld@gmail.com Address: 3000 S Las Vegas Blvd Connect with Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World By reaching out, you agree to our Privacy Policy. pages.casino: Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World Casino: A New Era of Gaming Excellence CASINO SPA & SALON ABOUT US Welcome to Our Casino Discover a wide selection of games, exciting promotions, and a loyalty program tailored just for you at our hotel casino. Enjoy the thrill of the game in a luxurious setting, where entertainment meets elegance. Please note that gambling is restricted to individuals aged 18 and above. Classic Reel Slots Our classic reel slots are a homage to the golden era of casino gaming, featuring the iconic symbols and simple gameplay that have captivated players for decades. These machines offer a timeless experience, combining the thrill of anticipation with the simplicity of classic casino style. Video Poker Machines For those seeking a more modern twist, our video poker machines stand at the cutting edge of slot technology, offering a dynamic and interactive gaming experience. With state-of-the-art graphics, engaging themes, and multiple play lines, video poker combines the strategy of traditional poker with the instant gratification of slot gaming. DIVE INTO TABLE GAMES Embark on an exhilarating journey into the heart of casino excitement with our expansive selection of table games, set within the sprawling 117,000 square feet of meticulously designed gaming space. Our casino is a vibrant hub of activity and energy, where each table game offers a unique blend of strategy, luck, and the timeless allure of gambling. From the seasoned high-roller to the curious newcomer, our array of table games caters to every type of player, offering an immersive experience that combines classic casino thrills with modern sophistication. Blackjack: The Quintessential Casino Experience Step up to the blackjack tables and immerse yourself in one of the most iconic card games known to the casino world. Craps: The Crowd Favorite Experience the communal excitement of craps, a game that combines luck, strategy, and the collective energy of its participants. Roulette: The Spin of Fortune Gather around the roulette wheel, where a single spin can determine fortunes with the drop of a ball. POKER ROOM Welcome to our state-of-the-art poker room, a sanctuary for both the seasoned poker veteran and the enthusiastic novice, designed to provide an unparalleled, immersive gaming experience. Spanning a generous area dedicated solely to the art and strategy of poker, our room is equipped with the latest in gaming technology, ensuring every hand dealt and every bluff made is set against the backdrop of cutting-edge innovation and comfort. A Venue of Prestige and Comfort Our poker room has been meticulously crafted to cater to the needs and desires of all poker players, offering a variety of environments from the electric atmosphere of major tournaments to the focused quiet of individual play. The decor marries sleek, modern design with the luxurious comfort expected from a high-caliber establishment, ensuring every player feels like a VIP from the moment they enter. By using our website, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy. Understanding Cookies Cookies are small text files stored on your computer or mobile device. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide a better browsing experience. Our Use of Cookies We use cookies for various purposes, including: - Ensuring the functionality of our website - Enhancing your browsing experience - Analyzing website traffic and usage patterns Types of Cookies We use the following types of cookies: - Essential Cookies: Necessary for the operation of our website. - Analytical/Performance Cookies: Help us analyze how visitors use our website and improve its performance. - Functionality Cookies: Enable us to remember your preferences and provide enhanced features. Cookie Management You can manage cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies, or set preferences for when you receive them. Please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website. Changes to this Cookie Policy We may update our Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices and services. Any updates will be posted on this page, and the date of the last revision will be indicated at the top. pages.index: Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World: Redefining Luxury on the Strip CASINO SPA & SALON ABOUT US Experience the Epitome of Luxury at Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World Where Tradition Meets Innovation: Your Ultimate Las Vegas Destination Discover Unmatched Luxury: A Sanctuary of Sophistication Embark on a journey to a realm where unparalleled luxury and meticulous attention to detail create an exceptional sensory experience. Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World offers rooms and suites as sanctuaries of sophistication with panoramic views, smart technology, and high-end design. Personalized service and bespoke amenities ensure a spectacular stay. Innovative Entertainment and Dining: A Symphony of Senses Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World revolutionizes entertainment and dining with world-class performances, concerts, and events. Our venues provide unparalleled audio-visual experiences, ensuring every moment is unforgettable. From live orchestras to rock concerts, experience entertainment at its best. Elegant Poolside Leisure Our resort's pool areas are masterpieces of design, offering a perfect blend of relaxation and entertainment. Each pool is thoughtfully landscaped to create a serene oasis amidst the excitement of Las Vegas. Whether you're looking to bask in the sun on comfortable loungers, enjoy a refreshing swim in crystal-clear waters, or indulge in a private cabana with bespoke services, our pools cater to your every desire. With poolside bars and restaurants serving delectable snacks and cocktails, every moment spent by the water is a delight to the senses. An Odyssey of Luxury, Excitement, and Innovation Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World extends a warm invitation for you to embark on an unparalleled journey of discovery, where the essence of luxury, the thrill of excitement, and the spirit of innovation merge to forge an experience that transcends the ordinary. A Sanctuary of Unmatched Luxury Dive into the depths of luxury with us, where every aspect of your stay is infused with unparalleled sophistication and elegance. From our exquisitely designed accommodations that offer a haven of comfort and serenity, to our lavish amenities that set the standard for luxury living, Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World is where your dreams become reality. A Haven of Luxury and Personalized Care Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World stands as a beacon of unparalleled luxury and meticulous service, offering a sanctuary where relaxation, rejuvenation, and exclusive experiences are the cornerstones of your stay. Our commitment to providing an exceptional guest experience is evident in every detail, from the serene ambiance of our world-class spa to the elegant leisure of our meticulously designed pools. Tradition Meets Innovation Experience the thrill of table games at Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World. From blackjack to poker, enjoy your favorite games in settings that blend sophistication with cutting-edge technology. Pinnacle of Sports Betting Immerse yourself in the excitement of sports betting at our sportsbook. With an expansive LED video wall and intuitive betting platform, enjoy an electrifying atmosphere and a variety of betting options. Unparalleled Gaming Experience Discover a world of gaming like no other at Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World. Our commitment to excellence and innovation ensures a gaming floor that caters to enthusiasts and casual players alike. Gourmet Dining Experience Indulge in a culinary adventure with our collection of gourmet restaurants, each led by celebrity chefs. Savor masterfully crafted dishes that showcase flavors from around the world, prepared with the finest ingredients. Casual Dining Delights Experience convenience without compromising on taste at our casual eateries and cafes. Enjoy a variety of artisanal sandwiches, fresh salads, street food, and pastries, designed to satisfy every craving. Join us at Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World, where every visit is a journey, every moment is a discovery, and every experience is a treasure waiting to be uncovered. Contact Us By reaching out, you agree to our Privacy Policy. pages.privacyPolicy: Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World: Our Commitment to Your Privacy CASINO SPA & SALON ABOUT US Privacy Policy of Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World At Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World, protecting the privacy and security of our users' information is a paramount concern. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we collect, the reasons for collection, and how we safeguard it. Information Collection To improve our services for all users, we collect various types of information, including: Contact Details: Such as name, email address, and phone number, provided during registration or inquiry. Browsing Data: Details of your visits to our site, including traffic and location data. Financial Transactions: Records of transactions conducted on our site, including bookings and payments. Use of Information The information we collect is used to: Customize your experience on our site. Enhance the functionality and services offered on our website. Efficiently manage transactions and bookings. Communicate with you regarding promotional activities, offers, and updates related to our services. Information Sharing We do not sell, trade, or share your personally identifiable information with external parties, except under the following circumstances: To comply with legal obligations. To protect our rights or property. To enforce our website policies. With contractors and service providers who assist in our business operations, under contractual terms that ensure the information is kept confidential and used only for the purposes intended. Data Protection We utilize various security measures to protect your personal data. However, it is important to note that no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is completely secure. Cookies Our website uses cookies to enhance user experience. You have the option to configure your browser to reject cookies or to alert you when cookies are being sent. Policy Updates Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World reserves the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Updates will be posted on our website's main page. Inquiries For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please feel free to contact us at privacy@lasvegashiltonatresortsworld.com. pages.spa: Las Vegas Hilton At Resorts World Spa & Salon: Oasis of Tranquility CASINO SPA & SALON ABOUT US Embrace a Journey Toward Complete Wellness Awana Spa serves as an avant-garde retreat dedicated to nurturing every aspect of your being, providing customized treatments, the latest facilities, and widely accessible wellness initiatives. This modern yet welcoming haven is designed according to the golden ratio, creating an environment with rooms that boast rounded contours, walls that curve gently, and spaces planned with precision to encourage a comprehensive and transformative health journey. Building on its foundation of bespoke wellness, Awana Spa introduces an extensive menu of treatments and services. From rejuvenating facials that employ cutting-edge skincare technology to deep tissue massages that draw on ancient healing techniques, each offering is tailored to meet the individual needs of our guests, ensuring a deeply personal path to well-being. A standout feature of Awana Spa is its Sauna-Meister-led experience, a ceremonial journey that elevates the traditional sauna visit into an art form. Through the expert manipulation of hot, aromatic steam with a towel, the Sauna-Meister conducts a symphony of warmth and fragrance, enveloping guests in a sensory experience that detoxifies the body, relaxes the mind, and uplifts the spirit. DiamondGlow Facial The DiamondGlow Facial is a next-level skin resurfacing treatment that delivers radiant, rejuvenated, and healthy-looking skin. Illuminating Vitamin C Facial Our Illuminating Vitamin C Facial is designed to combat the signs of aging and bring out your skin's natural glow. Moroccanoil Hydration Ritual Indulge in the ultimate hydration experience with our Moroccanoil Hydration Ritual, a luxurious treatment designed to deeply moisturize and revitalize your skin and hair. Awana Spa At Awana Spa, we are committed to providing our guests with an exceptional spa experience, offering a sanctuary of tranquility and rejuvenation. Each of our treatments is designed with your well-being in mind, utilizing only the finest products and techniques to ensure you leave feeling refreshed, revitalized, and glowing. Whether you're seeking to address specific skin concerns, unwind with a luxurious pampering session, or simply enjoy a moment of peace, Awana Spa offers a serene escape from the everyday. Spa & Salon at Resorts World Las Vegas Embark on a journey of relaxation, beauty, and wellness at the Spa & Salon at Resorts World Las Vegas. Our tranquil oasis is designed to provide an escape from the hustle and bustle of the city, allowing you to refresh your body, mind, and spirit. We invite you to join us and discover the ultimate in luxury and relaxation. Book your appointment today and prepare to be transformed at the Spa & Salon at Resorts World Las Vegas.
